Remove observations with NAs:
```{r}
cex <- na.omit(cex)
```

```{r}
data_stats <- data.frame(
  Variable = c("John", "Jane", "Alice", "Bob"),
  PSID = c(23, 25, 30, 22),
  CEX = c("Male", "Female", "Female", "Male")
)
kable(data_stats)

```
